termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.intro: Welcome to our Terms and Conditions. Please read these carefully before using our website.

sections.title: Services Provided
sections.content: The Company offers website design, automation structure services, and related consultations. Users may book a 15-minute introductory call through the website.

sections.title: Booking Policy
items: Users are allowed to book up to two 15-minute calls per month. Abuse of this feature may result in account restrictions or denial of service.
The Company reserves the right to cancel or reschedule bookings in case of unforeseen circumstances.

sections.title: User Obligations
sections.content: By using the website, you agree to:
items: Refrain from unlawful activities while using our website.
Respect the intellectual property rights of the Company.

sections.title: Liability Limitations
sections.content: The website and its services are provided on an "as is" basis without warranties of any kind. The Company is not liable for:
items: Any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the website or services.
Errors, delays, or interruptions in the website’s operation.

sections.title: Age Restrictions
sections.content: This website is not intended for users under 18 years old. By using this site, you confirm that you are at least 18 years of age.

sections.title: Changes to the Terms
sections.content: The Company reserves the right to update these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective upon posting to this website. Continued use constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Nikola Popovic (“we,” “our,” or “us”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect the following personal data when you interact with our website:

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your information with third parties. We use your data to:
items: Provide services, including booking and managing consultations.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: We store your data for up to 3 years unless you request deletion. After this period, your data will be securely deleted or anonymized.

sections.title: Your Rights
items: Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
Request a copy of your data or its transfer to another service.

sections.title: Data Storage
sections.content: Your data is securely stored in our Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system, Lead Connector.

sections.title: Cookies and Analytics
sections.content: TWe use tools such as Facebook Pixels, Google Tags, and Plausible Analytics to understand website traffic and improve user experience. These tools may collect anonymized browsing data.

sections.title: Children’s Privacy
sections.content: Our website is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.  If you believe a child has provided personal data, please contact us to delete it.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our data practices. Updates will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.
